name: Send Notification
description: Send a notification through NotifyX across SMS, Email, Push, or Slack.

inputs.name: channel
inputs.description: Channel to send the notification (email, sms, slack, push).

inputs.name: recipient
inputs.description: The recipient address, e.g., email ID or phone number.

inputs.name: template
inputs.description: Template ID to use for the notification.

inputs.name: metadata
inputs.description: Additional metadata to include with the notification.

outputs.name: notificationId
outputs.description: Unique ID for tracking the notification.

outputs.name: deliveryStatus
outputs.description: Current delivery status of the notification.

outputs.name: channels
outputs.description: List of channels the notification was sent through.

outputs.name: sentAt
outputs.description: Timestamp when the notification was sent.
